ing: 1 serrano pepper, seeded and minced, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is a very quick and easy salsa recipe that works great on tacos, fajitas, or just as another dip for chips."
ins: Stir mango, tomatoes, onion, cilantro, serrano pepper, and garlic together in a bowl. Drizzle lime juice over the mango mixture and mix well. Season with salt and black pepper. Refrigerate until flavors blend and salsa is cold, at least 30 minutes.
